name: Archmage
description: A master of arcane power, capable of devastating spellcasting

skills.name: Arcane Mastery
skills.description: When you cast a spell, you make the attack roll with 1 boon. In addition, when a creature rolls a challenge roll against one of your spells, it does so with 1 bane.

skills.name: Improved Spell Recovery
skills.description: When you use an action or your Spell Recovery talent to recover Power, you recover 2 Power instead of the usual amount. If you would recover more than 2 Power, you recover that amount instead.

skills.name: Arcane Might
skills.description: When you cast a spell that deals damage, you deal extra damage equal to your Power.

skills.name: Greater Counterspell
skills.description: When you use Counterspell, the attacking creature makes the spellcasting roll with 1 bane when it targets you and with 3 banes when it targets a creature other than you within 10 yards of you.

choices.description: You discover one tradition of magic.
